docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Dec. 22-- The advent of the holidays and nest week's visit by the Brazilian Foreign Minister to Uruguay make unlikely any final agreement with the United States this year on the installation of a tracking station for guided missiles...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Dec. 22-- The advent of the holidays and nest week's visit by the Brazilian Foreign Minister to Uruguay make unlikely any final agreement with the United States this year on the installation of a tracking station for guided missiles on Fernando de Noronha Island.
